description: This is a FastAPI application entry point for the CoreAPI&Services project, defining the main app object, health endpoints, and optional router inclusion logic.

methods.name: _optional_include_router
methods.description: Attempts to import and include a router module at runtime if it exists.

methods.name: healthz
methods.description: Liveness endpoint returning a simple status indicating the service is running.

methods.name: readyz
methods.description: Readiness endpoint currently always indicating the service is ready.
